prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with sleek, streamlined features and a blue and gray color scheme.
Imagine a prehistoric Pokemon with sharp claws and a brownish-orange shell design.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon that has a unique blend of rock and bug attributes.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles an ancient creature, featuring a mix of green and yellow shades.
Design a fossil Pokemon that thrives in both land and water environments, with striking color contrasts.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of agility and stealth, with sharp, pointed features.
Give me a Pokemon that has a distinct exoskeleton, showcasing earthy tones and angular shapes.
